actionable_tasks.title: Implement Circuit Breaker for Provider Failover
actionable_tasks.description: Add circuit breaker logic to the backend chat pipeline to handle provider failures gracefully and switch to backup providers automatically.
implementation_steps: Research and select a lightweight circuit breaker library (e.g., opossum).
Integrate the circuit breaker into the chat pipeline for each LLM provider.
Configure failover logic to switch to a secondary provider on failure.
Add debug logging for failover events.

actionable_tasks.title: Add Request Correlation IDs for End-to-End Tracing
actionable_tasks.description: Attach a unique correlation ID to each request in the backend chat pipeline for easier tracing and debugging.
implementation_steps: Create a middleware to generate and attach a correlation ID to each request.
Pass the correlation ID through all backend services and log it with each operation.
Ensure the ID is returned in API responses for frontend debugging.

actionable_tasks.title: Implement Backend Chat Pipeline for User Context
actionable_tasks.description: Enhance the backend chat pipeline to attach user context (mood/history/preferences) and persist conversation summaries.
implementation_steps: Modify the chat pipeline to accept and attach user context.
Store conversation summaries in the database.
Ensure context is persisted and retrieved for future sessions.

actionable_tasks.title: Implement MongoDB Compound Indexes for Analytics Queries
actionable_tasks.description: Create compound indexes in MongoDB to optimize analytics queries for faster response times.
implementation_steps: Identify the most frequently queried fields in analytics.
Create compound indexes for these fields in MongoDB.
Test query performance before and after index creation.

actionable_tasks.title: Implement TTL Indexes for Telemetry Data Rotation
actionable_tasks.description: Set up TTL indexes in MongoDB to automatically rotate and delete old telemetry data.
implementation_steps: Determine the retention period for telemetry data.
Create TTL indexes in MongoDB for telemetry collections.
Test data rotation and deletion.

actionable_tasks.title: Implement Response Streaming for Large Datasets
actionable_tasks.description: Enable response streaming in the backend to handle large datasets efficiently and improve user experience.
implementation_steps: Modify API endpoints to support streaming responses.
Test streaming with large datasets to ensure performance improvements.

actionable_tasks.title: Implement Prometheus Metrics Export for Alerting
actionable_tasks.description: Add Prometheus metrics export to the backend for real-time alerting and monitoring.
implementation_steps: Integrate a Prometheus client library.
Expose key metrics via a dedicated endpoint.
Configure Prometheus to scrape metrics from the endpoint.

actionable_tasks.title: Implement Backend Settings for Provider Configs and DB Ops
actionable_tasks.description: Enhance backend settings to validate and apply provider configurations and database operations.
implementation_steps: Add validation logic for provider configurations.
Implement functions to apply configurations and perform database operations.
Ensure settings are persisted and can be updated dynamically.
